entry.title: esProc SPL: Equivalent to the Python-enhanced DuckDB
entry.summary:
For desktop data analysis users, if DuckDB is the handy â€˜SQL Swiss Army Knife,â€™ then esProc SPL is an â€˜all-in-one toolboxâ€™ with built-in Python capabilities, maintaining SQLâ€™s ease of use while overcoming its inherent limitations. Like DuckDB, esProc SPL offers excellent support for file handling. Common files like CSV and Excel can be used directly as databases, allowing you to run SQL queries immediately. For example, query sales data: $SELECT region, SUM(amount) FROM sales.csv GROUP BY region
Such lightweight operations are a breeze for esProc. Similar to DuckDB, esProc also supports data binarization, but it stores data as files with excellent compression ratios. Loading millions of rows takes just seconds, making it at least three times faster than reading CSV directly. Currently, esâ€¦
